daily_take.headline: War bets just flipped. Iran strikes odds hit coin-flip territory.
daily_take.deck: US-Iran conflict odds jumped 5 points overnight to hit 51.5%, meaning the market now prices military action as a true toss-up by mid-March. The move signals genuine uncertainty about Trump administration escalation, not fringe paranoia. With $3.2M in volume, this isn't retail guesswork anymore.
